constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 217 (Thursday, December 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 6318.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H7833]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain tax benefits related to empowerment zones to the District of Columbia.
